name: astonish
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user attacks the target while crying out in a startling fashion.
